system.description: Wizards are scholars of the arcane who cast spells through careful study and precise technique. Their deep understanding of magical theory makes them versatile backline blasters.

features.name: Arcane Scholar
features.description: You can Cast Spells using Arcana. Spells: You learn 4 Spells. You learn 1 other Spell every 2 Levels in this Class hereafter. Mana: Your Maximum Mana is equal to (4 × your Wizard Level), and the highest amount of Mana you can spend to Cast a Spell is equal to (Reason + half your Wizard Level, round up). You regain spent Mana when you Rest.

features.name: Spellbook
features.description: You get the Ritualist Perk. You have a Spellbook that contains the details and methods of Casting your Spells. If you lose your Spellbook, you can recopy it during a Rest using materials worth 5s × your Wizard Level. You can copy Spells from others' Spellbooks or Scrolls; doing so costs 5s and requires 1 hour per Spell.

features.name: Focused Casting
features.description: You can Focus on two Spells simultaneously, rather than one.

features.name: Magical Thesis
features.description: Choose one: Abjurer (reduce damage from Spells by 1 per die), Conjurer (summons have +1 Armor), Evoker (Spell damage dice can explode), or Illusionist (Illusions are Favored to disbelieve).

features.name: Multicast
features.description: When you Cast a Spell with a Range of Close or farther, you can spend 1 additional Mana to Target an additional Being within Range.

features.name: Greater Thesis
features.description: Your Magical Thesis improves. Abjurer (reduce by 2), Conjurer (summons have +2 Armor), Evoker (explode on two highest values), Illusionist (Illusions deal psychic damage on failed disbelief).

features.name: Arcane Mastery
features.description: Once per Day, you can Cast a Spell without spending Mana.
